root.name: root
root.message: You enter a dusty hall. The oak-paneled walls are carved with woodland scenes of trees, falling leaves, and tiny critters. The balcony has doors to the master bedroom, the bathroom, the storage room and the nursemaid's suite. From here you can also go a floor down.
choices: Use the stairs to go a floor down

c1a.name: c1a
c1a.message: You notice notice tiny corpses hanging from the trees and worms bursting up from the ground carved in the walls. You also notice a secret door.

c2a.name: c2a
c2a.message: You push at the location where you just saw an outline of a secret door. It pushes open easily to reveal a cobweb-filled woorden staircase leading up to the attic
